name: Sherlocked 2D
description:
Are you a smart person? Do you notice small details that normal people do not even see? Are you a big fan of Sherlock Holmes? Do you like Mystery/Horror games? Well, this game is made for you. 

Sherlocked 2D is detective simulator game where you can collect clues, ask suspects and accuse freely the one you found guilty. 

Note: The game is still in beta version and new cases and features will be added regularly. 

Note: This is a complete work of fiction. Names, characters, business, events and incidents are the products of the author’s imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
